name: Salvation (hunterkennedy)
description:
Salvation is a short walking sim where the player must use environmental deduction to understand the link that joins three characters together across time and space.

- Controls -

Left click to cycle between characters

WASD to move

- Attributions -

Astronaut Helmet: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/astronaut-helmet-315605194a474c7b95cd2a9083985d2...

 Cowboy Hat: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cowboy-hat-d4bee845c7a443adbdc7dee04f63a423

 Army helmet: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/m1-helmet-6d7929b10c994db0b6b39e35b379bfbd

I missed the first day of the jam, so this game was made over the course of ~14 hours. By far my fastest game.
